titles.title: Personal Exemption Fairness Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to adjust personal exemptions for high cost-of-living areas.
Personal Exemption Fairness Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: Personal Exemption Fairness Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require annual metropolitan statistical area cost-of-living adjustments, beginning after 2010, to the personal tax exemption amount. Directs the Secretary of Labor to determine and publish a cost-of-living index for each metropolitan statistical area.
